description:
Under the ‘Make in India’ program different companies and PSU want to be market competitive. To do that they require appropriate organization structure which may secure trust of partner organization and effectively absorb the technology.  The new organization (i.e. JV) will also provide for better revenue model. To execute JV, one needs understanding of compliance and nuances of incorporating a company. This course will prepare the candidate to that end.     

                                            Syllabus
                        Week 1: How technology transfer can be facilitated through Strategic Alliance [SA] and Joint Venture [JV]Week 2: Joint Venture OptionsWeek 3: Joint Venture Agreements and Due Diligence Week 4: Special Purpose Vehicles [SPV]
title: Technology Transfer through Joint Venture
